column5: <think>#Newline    	    <set name="surveyemail">survey@company.com</set>#Newline    	    <set name="surveyname">User Survey</set>#Newline            <set name="question1">Who is/are the person/s?</set>#Newline            <set name="question2">Can you describe the problem from someone's point of view who was not involved in it?</set>#Newline            <set name="question3">How do you describe this problem?</set>#Newline            <set name="question4">How does the other person describe it?</set>#Newline            <set name="question5">Why do you see the problem that way?</set>#Newline            <set name="question6">Why does the other person see the problem that way?</set>#Newline            <set name="question7">What/How do you feel about it?</set>#Newline            <set name="question8">What kind of thoughts did you have about it?</set>#Newline            <set name="question9">Thank you for your response#Comma type END to end survey</set>#Newline            <set name="responses">Survey Responses: </set>#Newline            <set name="qnum">1</set>#Newline    	</think>#Newline	    <srai>SurveyLoop</srai>

<think>#Newline            <set name="topic"/>#Newline            <set name="responses"><get name="responses"/> --- <star/></set>#Newline            <set name="qnum"><map name="successor"><get name="qnum"/></map></set>#Newline        </think>#Newline        <srai>SurveyLoop</srai>
That's the end of the survey
